text: "The Harder They Come" is a 1972 song by Jamaican singer Jimmy Cliff and was used in the 1972 movie of the same name. It has been covered by numerous artists since its release. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Jimmy Cliff songs Category:Cher songs Category:Joe Jackson (musician) songs Category:Madness (band) songs Category:Willie Nelson songs
title: The Harder They Come (song)
